ygData.subject: Change of plans
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron retired to a large penthouse style room. It was probly one of the ships officers rooms, but he got in a didnt care whos feelings he hurt. Hell Beast

Subject: Change of plans
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 82
From: JP3884@...

    Megatron retired to a large penthouse style room. It was probly one of 
the ships officers rooms, but he got in a didnt care whos feelings he hurt. 
Hell Beast joined him, as did Tarantulas, seeing as how Aracnia was intent on 
going along with Kitkat.
    He sat in the sitting area, joined by the other two, large, bots. They 
all sat across from each other, looking at each other with those sinister 
optocs.
    "Gentlemen, I dont know if youre aware of this but I have taken it apon 
myself to investigate Allience activities within the past few days," Senator  
Hell Beast went on, diplomatically, "And I have to say we are up agianst a 
rather powerful opponent."
    Tarantulas took in a deep breath and let it come out loudly. He hated the 
Allience, Maximals, and even some of the Predacons. But with the Allience 
gone, or weakened for awhile, it would give the Predacons a chance to 
dominate the War. 
    Megatron crossed his arms, "And why do you say that, Senator?" Bad news 
was never a thing Megatron took too well. And seeing as how this was a rather 
important manuver for the entire Predacon Empire, he was pissed off.
    "The massive was ship known as the Iron Fist is the new Allience strong 
hold. Not only that, they also have their old ship docked there too. Its 
wepons and shileds are outstanding in the sense that if we were to attack, we 
would be blown to smitherines." He said. "Also, its on an island located off 
the mainland. We would have to get there arialy. It would be a large risk."     
    "So youre saying that an attack would be unwise?" Tarantulas rhasped as 
he tapped his claws on the arms of the chairs.
    Hell Beast went on. "No, no no no. Not at all. I propose an attack. But a 
different kind." He was now clearly smiling.
    Megatron, bluntly, "What kind of scheme are you thinking of? I want to 
win this....and if I lose I dont want to lose anything big."
    "Underwater. We construct a submarine. One powerful enough to take on the 
Iron fist, deploy troops, and hold together." He said finally, and then 
relaxed.
    Tarantulas began to nod, as if he were coming up with the blue prints in 
his insane little mind. Standing up he reached a display board and brought 
online the blueprints to Black Aracnia's ship. 
    "We could use this as out....um...foundation as to say. We would 
deffinetly need a few modifications, and more firepower. But it could be 
done." He then chuckled and tunred to face the others.
    Now they waited for Megatron to speak. He sat quite, motionless in his 
arm chiar. It seemd he was in pain the way his eyes opened and closed slowly, 
as if in a hypnotic pattern.
    He cleared his throat, opened his mouth, "Let it be done. I will tell 
Kitkat and Black Aracnia of our plans for the Sub-destroyer. Tarantulas and 
Hell Beast, you assemble and team and get the blueprints in order. I want 
this thng done carefully, quickly, and most of all I want no mess ups." He 
stood.   "Hurry, the sooner this is done, the sooner we will dominate this 
rock. FOR THE GLORY OF THE PREDACON EMPIRE!" He shouted, saluted, and exited.
